definition[0]: if a person or business relocates, or if they are relocated, they move to a different place
example[0]: A lot of firms are relocating to the North of England.
example[1]: businesses that relocate in depressed areas
example[2]: The residents were relocated to temporary accommodation while the work was being done.
definition[1]: if a company or worker relocates or is relocated, they move to a different place
example[3]: Many workers are unwilling to relocate.
example[4]: The company plans to relocate its corporate headquarters to Iowa.
